name: minnesota
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a state in the northern central US, whose capital city is Saint Paul: In May the coldest state was Minnesota. No ethnic group is so identified with a single state as the Swedes are with Minnesota.
More examplesFewer examplesThey are high school students from Minnesota.She moved to Minnesota after her divorce.
